Bank Swallow
======================================

Analysis of Bank Swallow population dynamics on the Sacramento River, based on annual burrow count surveys (1999-2023). Evaluation of effects of river flow (including lagged effects), density dependence, and long-term trends on annual population growth rates.


## CURRENT STATUS

Analysis and manuscript in development


## CORE PROJECT TEAM

Kristen Dybala (Point Blue), Greg Golet (The Nature Conservancy)
